1.  Identify a large, complex data set
  -  Large - Larger than you can take the time to look at the entire set in Excel.
  -  Covers a range of data (you may need to get two data sources to do this)
  -  Consider a potential client
    -  **Co**ntext
    -  **N**eeds
    -  **V**ision
    -  **O**utcome
  - Basic plotting of available data
  
2.  Process it
  -  The data must need processing
  -  Missing values
  -  Data entry errors
  -  Collapsing categories
3.  Summarize it
  -  Data summaries
  -  Visual
4.  Tell a story
5.  Show a picture
  -  Make it pretty.
  
Timeline
--------

1.  Form team. Identify a data set and a potential CoNVO and basic plots of data - February 20

2.  Exploratory data analysis - March 20
  -  Detailed Exploratory Data Analysis of data set
  -  Refine CoNVO
3.  Final Report April 17,  Presentations April 18, 19
